questions.question: What sound does a cow make?
questions.explanation: Cows say 'Moo'! They are farm animals that give us milk.

questions.question: Which animal has a long trunk?
questions.explanation: Elephants have long trunks that they use like a hand to pick things up!

questions.question: What do we call a baby cat?
questions.explanation: A baby cat is called a kitten. They grow up to be cats!

questions.question: Which animal lives in the water and has fins?
questions.explanation: Fish live in water and use their fins to swim. They breathe through gills!

questions.question: What animal is known for jumping very high?
questions.explanation: Kangaroos can jump very high and far! They live in Australia.
